text: Hi all, and welcome on- board the newcomers! Thanks already about the new inputs and community ideas..A lot to discuss; just to let you know that we`ll wait till 12 pm (today, Friday 3/3) and then we`ll confirm (here), latest Mon morning,  the date for Zoom + link; have a good weekend/imaging
